question: Eating sweets before bedtime..............?
question_content:
we all know that eating sweets right before bedtime causes plaque and decay. 

why is it that toothpaste contains so much sugar, yet we "clean" our teeth with it everyday?! surely the sugar is harmful as we are literally coating it onto our teeth twice a day!

answers.answer_content: No sugar in toothpaste, they put SORBITOL into toothpaste, this is a sweetener not a sugar and will not harm your teeth
my toothpaste doesnt have any sugar in it.......so idk where that is coming from and its not just sweets that you eat that causes plaque ANYTHING you eat at ANY time causes plaque....
A question. Please show me the data that shows that toothpastes contain sugar.  Thanks
